solutionName: Major Incident Management Using MS Teams
solutionUrlTitle: Major Incident Management Using MS Teams

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
Incidentmanagers are using disconnected systems to manage Major incidents which iscausing cluttered experience in orchestrating major incidents.
Majorincident is being handled by existing disconnected capabilities like desk phonesystem, manual creation of teams and channels for every major incident,document management systems and manual sync of incident logs to incidentmanagement system after resolution.
Thissolution addresses the gap in collaboration, communication and related assetmanagement during Major Incident Management.
Thisautomated solution eliminates manual processes and provides an integrated majorincident management using Microsoft Teams capabilities.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
Thissolution automates Incident notification in MS Teams, provides a unifiedplatform to orchestrate and manage Major incidents on Microsoft Teams platform,using Microsoft Teams platforms out of the box capabilities for Collaborationand communication.
Incidentmanagers can create work streams, update and close the incidents from Teams.Solution takes care of search and syncing the data with incident managementsystem.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content:
Incidentmanagers and work stream stakeholders can effectively use Microsoft Teamscollaboration capabilities like “Meet Now”, Message extensions to searchincidents, Adaptive cards based notifications, BOTs based on Azure BOTframework and Power Platform for process automation.
UsingMicrosoft Teams as application development and delivery platform helped inconstruction of this solution and reduced the over application switching duringthe incident management process.
